channel.description: Recent content in Blessings on Faith-Blog

item.title: Activation
item.description: Abraham’s blessings are mine, Abraham’s blessings are mine. I am blessed in the morning, I am blessed in the evening. Abraham’s blessings are mine As believers, we are blessed with every spiritual blessings prepared for us in heavenly places in Christ Jesus. We have exceeding great and precious promises set to our credit and documented in the Word. Jesus Christ came and died for us to redeem us from the curse of the law and to bring us into spiritual blessings I Corinthians 1:3.
